default.description: Default background color that should be applied to all pages other than login and dashboard pages.

warning.description: Background color for warning alerts and notifications.

default.description: Background color for default alerts and notifications.

success.description: Background color for success alerts and notifications.

neutral.description: Background color for neutral alerts and notifications.

error.description: Background color for error alerts and notifications.

warning.description: Fill color to be used behind white warning icon.

success.description: Fill color to be used behind white success icon.

neutral.description: Fill color to be used behind white neutral/information icon.

error.description: Fill color to be used behind white error icon.

focus.description: Global focus color for better accessibility.

success.description: Border color for success alerts and notifications.

warning.description: Border color for success alerts and notifications.

neutral.description: Border color for success alerts and notifications.

error.description: Border color for success alerts and notifications.

warning.description: Text color for warning and draft notifications.

neutral.description: Text color for hint, neutral and pending notifications.

error.description: Text color for error and failure notifications.

thin.description: Border width tokens should only be used within the border property.

thick.description: Border width tokens should only be used within the border property.

thicker.description: Border width tokens should only be used within the border property.

thickest.description: Border width tokens should only be used within the border property.

reset.description: Generic reset border radius for global use.

circle.description: Circle border radius for global use. Figma does not allow for the use of percentages for border radius.

xsmall.description: Generic extra small border radius value.

xlarge.description: Generic extra large border radius value.

light.description: Light font weight. Converted from numeric value: 300

normal.description: Normal or regular font weight. Converted from numeric value: 400

bold.description: Bold font weight. Converted from numeric value: 700

default.description: Minimum accessible line height value. Converted from numeric value: 1.5

fluid.description: Height used to span the entire height of its children. Figma does not allow for the use of percentages for sizing.
Width used to span the entirety of its parent container. Figma does not allow for the use of percentages for sizing.

fields.description: Width of input fields that are not full width.
